results.title: Taming the Sutlej
results.creator_credit: Ravi Prakash, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
results.brief_description: The Bhakra-Nangal Project designed to provide a year-round supply of water for irrigation and hydro-electric power for homes and industry, consists of two dams across the Sutlej, one at Bhakra, the other at Nangal. This film records the work done by men and machines in an effort to complete the job before the specified date.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ravi Prakash, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
results.description: The Bhakra-Nangal Project designed to provide a year-round supply of water for irrigation and hydro-electric power for homes and industry, consists of two dams across the Sutlej, one at Bhakra, the other at Nangal. results.title: Taming the Red Swamp
results.brief_description: A swamp was formed when sand shaped a land bridge between Wilson’s Promontory and the mainland. Shows the draining and cultivating of the Red Swamp, the addition of chemicals to the original peat, and the sowing of a seed mixture of several grasses and clovers. Dairy cattle now feed here on some of the best red clover in the State.

results.title: Taming the crippler
results.creator_credit: Jay Bonafield and RKO Pathe Pictures
results.brief_description: Shows the progress since 1916 of the battle to defeat poliomyelitis. Earlier devices and treatments with respirators, physical therapy, hydro-therapy, hot-packs are depicted. Concludes with the introduction of the salk vaccine.

results.title: Talking to learn
results.brief_description:
Highlights the imnportance of group discussion as a means of language development and learning by focusing on a group of year ten students at Geraldton, Western Australia.
Suitable for teacher training.

results.title: Talking of teeth
results.creator_credit: R.D. Hansen and Fortune Film Productions
results.brief_description: Examines the causes of dental decay, the effects of badly spaced teeth, the structure and care of teeth, and the value of visits to the dentist. Stresses the cultivation of the correct attitude to teeth care.

results.title: Talking metric
results.creator_credit: Peter Riding, Michael Garrod and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “BBC Know How Series”
Discusses the change to the metric system in industry, its advantage and opportunities for rationalisation procedure in changeover, training and other aspects.

results.title: Talking hands 2. Parts 18-25 (Captioned)
results.brief_description: Viewers are introduced to signed English by teaching signs for 300 words most commonly used. Includes practice with short sentences. The vocabulary of the original Talking Hands is extended by 400 signs in Talking Hands 2.
